strings.MSU_EXPANSION_DESC: Enables the Test content for Moonstorm shared utils, used for testing the API's systems.
strings.MSU_ITEM_GENERICITEM_DESC: Increases all your stats by {0}% (+{0}% per stack)
strings.MSU_ITEM_GENERICVOIDITEM_PICKUP: Increases all stats on low health
strings.MSU_ITEM_GENERICVOIDITEM_DESC: While on low health, Obtain a buff that increases all your stats by {0}% (+{0}% per stack), enemies that attack you while you have this buff become cripplied for {1} second.
